name: sdev265
description: ## Project Overview The **DnD Character Management Tool** is a proposed web-based application designed to assist Dungeons & Dragons (DnD) players and Dungeon Masters (DMs) in managing character sheets more effectively. The tool will include essential features such as character creation, stat tracking, inventory management, and save/load functionality. It will be developed using Python for the backend and HTML/CSS for the frontend, and will integrate a database to store and retrieve character information. The application is intended to be accessible on computers, offering a user-friendly interface that enhances the gameplay experience for all users.
